verses.1: Siampi lianpen ahi peuhpeuh mipa pen a miteʼ mawhna hangin Pasianʼ tungah biakna le letsong a piaksak dingin ama mipihte lak panin kiteelin nasep a kiguan ahi hi.
verses.2: Amah zong lam tampi ah a gina lo thei mi mah ahih manin thu thei lo mite le a khial mite tungah lungnem takin na sem thei hi.
verses.3: Amah zong mi ginalo mi mah ahih manin miteʼ mawhna hangin biakna a pia hi bek loin ama mawhna mahmah hangin zong biakna a pia ahi hi.
verses.4: Tua bangin pahtawina a nei siampi lianpen nasep pen a sem dingte amau utthu tawh a kisehtawm mawk hi lo hi; siampi lianpen a sem dingin a mahmah a kisehtawm hi lo a, Aaron a kisap mah bangin Pasian in amah a seh ahi hi.
verses.5: Tua mah bangin Khris zong, a mahmah in siampi lianpen nasep a sem tawm mawk hi loin Pasian in ama kiangah, “Nang, ka Tapa na hi hi. Tu ni-in na Pa ka suak hi,” na ci hi.
verses.6: Mun dang khat ah zong, “Melkhizedek siampi gui zui-in a tawntungin siampi na hi ding hi,” na ci lai hi.
verses.7: Leitungah mihingin Jesu a om lai-in sihna panin amah a hon khia thei ding Pasian tungah thu ngenin khitui naptui tawh thumin na kiko hi.
verses.8: Amah, Pasianʼ Tapa hi napi-in a thuakna tawh thumang ahih theih nading a na kisin hi.
verses.9: Tua bangin a cingtaak mi a suah khit ciangin ama thu a mang mite khempeuh adingin tawntung hotkhiatna a kipatna hong suak a,
verses.10: Melkhizedek gui zui-in siampi lianpen dingin Pasian in a bawl hi.
verses.11: Hih thu tawh kisai-in i gen ding tampi a om hangin note in thu thei hak mahmah na hih manun i gen tel theih nading haksa hi.
verses.12: Tu-in note pen midang a hilh dingin sia na suah theih ding uh hun hi khin napi-in note mahmah pen Pasianʼ thu a bulpite hilh ding na kisam lai uh hi. Antak ne thei nai loin nawi bek a ne thei lai na hi uh hi.
verses.13: Nawi bek a ne laite pen naungek ahih manin a man le a man lo thu bangmah phawk thei nai lo uh hi.
verses.14: Ahi zongin antak i cih pen a sia le a pha a khen thei, a lim le a lim lo a khen thei ta, a khangham khin sa mite ading ahi hi.
